h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Captain Wise-Voice
content: Other times, it will perform a series of slow stomps, causing multiple electric spots to appear around you. You'll need to sprint away from these spots before a delayed lightning blast can strike the ground where you are.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Captain Wise-Voice'.
The content is as follows:
Other times, it will perform a series of slow stomps, causing multiple electric spots to appear around you. You'll need to sprint away from these spots before a delayed lightning blast can strike the ground where you are.
